body: The tests run, but I just noticed that `piecewise_constant` isn't available as `tf.train.piecewise_constant`, and I don't know how to fix this as I don't see any relevant entries in `tensorflow/python/training/__init__.py` or `tensorflow/python/__init__.py`. I'll fix if you advise.
